title: Godolphin Stakes
text:
The Godolphin Stakes is a <a href="Conditions%20races">Listed</a> <a href="Flat%20racing">flat</a> <a href="Horse%20racing">horse race</a> in Great Britain open to horses aged three years or older.
It is run at <a href="Newmarket%20Racecourse">Newmarket</a> over a distance of 1 mile and 4 furlongs (2,413 metres), and it is scheduled to take place each year in September.
